attributes.name: Ownable

attributes.documentation:
@dev The Ownable constructor sets the original `owner` of the contract to the sender
account.
attributes.name: Ownable

attributes.documentation: @dev Throws if called by any account other than the owner.
attributes.name: onlyOwner

attributes.documentation:
@dev Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.
@param newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
attributes.name: transferOwnership

attributes.documentation:
@title Pausable
@dev Base contract which allows children to implement an emergency stop mechanism.
attributes.name: Pausable

attributes.documentation: @dev Modifier to make a function callable only when the contract is not paused.
attributes.name: whenNotPaused

attributes.documentation: @dev Modifier to make a function callable only when the contract is paused.
attributes.name: whenPaused

attributes.documentation: @dev called by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state
attributes.name: pause

attributes.documentation: @dev called by the owner to unpause, returns to normal state
attributes.name: unpause

attributes.documentation:
@title SafeMath
@dev Math operations with safety checks that throw on error
attributes.name: SafeMath

attributes.documentation: @dev Multiplies two numbers, throws on overflow.
attributes.name: mul

attributes.documentation: @dev Integer division of two numbers, truncating the quotient.
attributes.name: div

attributes.documentation: @dev Subtracts two numbers, throws on overflow (i.e. if subtrahend is greater than minuend).
attributes.name: sub

attributes.documentation: @dev Adds two numbers, throws on overflow.
attributes.name: add
AuctionBase

attributes.documentation: @dev Throws if called by any account other than the seller for a given auction.
attributes.name: onlySeller

attributes.documentation: @notice Creates an auction with an ID equivalent ot the value of nextAuctionId, then puts the caller's address in the auctionIdToSeller mapping.
attributes.name: createEmptyAuction
FeeCollector

attributes.documentation: @dev Throws if called by any account other than the seller for a given auction.
attributes.name: requiresFee
DescendingPriceAuction

attributes.documentation: @notice Should immediately end the auction by transferring the winnings to the bidder, as long as the bid is valid.
attributes.name: bid

attributes.documentation:
@notice Stores the requisite pricing information for a descending price auction.
Takes a 2% cut of the start price
attributes.name: setAuctionPricing
inWhitelist
addToWhitelist
removeFromWhitelist
ERC20Basic

attributes.documentation:
@title ERC20 interface
@dev see https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/issues/20
attributes.name: ERC20
ERC20Auction

attributes.documentation: @notice Stores the given information for an auction for the given tokens, then attempts to transfer the tokens from the auction seller to this contract to start the auction.
attributes.name: setAuctionAsset

attributes.documentation: @dev Transfers tokens from an auction seller to the auction contract. This requires the auction to have been approved for taking control of the ERC20 tokens.
attributes.name: escrowERC20Tokens
DescendingPriceERC20Auction

attributes.documentation:
@notice Creates and starts an auction with the given pricing and asset information.
@dev Composes the setup for the DescendingPriceAuction, ERC20Auction and AuctionBase.
attributes.name: createAuction
